sentences.sentence: There is no excuse for sloppiness in your work.
sentences.translation: 你在工作中敷衍了事，这无论如何说不过去。

sentences.sentence: Failures caused by sloppiness or laziness are bad.
sentences.translation: 因马虎或懒惰导致的失败是坏事。

sentences.sentence: I read the paper and call it crap by virtue of the sloppiness of the work.
sentences.translation: 我读完认为这篇论文是垃圾的原因 是因为这根本就是一项马虎的研究.
